job_purpose: Join an agile development team at FTP Solutions to work on the new Productivity product on the IMS platform, contributing to high-level design and hands-on implementation.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead & Design technical roadmap in collaboration with developers, UX designer, Product Owner, and CTO
Write, test, and debug code using TypeScript (Node.js/React) and Python (Django)
Explore real-world datasets for insights and patterns
Streamline and improve CI/CD pipelines for smooth releases
Contribute to test strategies for secure, stable, and high-performing software
Mentor team members and foster a healthy team culture
required_qualifications: Strong experience as a software developer
Comfortable with relational databases like Postgres or MSSQL
Familiarity with DevOps practices, automated testing, and CI/CD pipelines
Experience mentoring others and contributing to team culture
preferred_qualifications: Degree in computer science or related field
Exposure to mining or industrial technologies
Experience with networking, OT, or telecommunications
company_details: FTP Solutions values a fun, inclusive, and respectful environment where everyone can thrive. They encourage building useful tools that people love to use and working in a diverse team. The company invests in personal and professional development, promotes an inclusive culture, and offers challenging work in a supportive environment.
